title: Documentary: 1948 - 1976
creator_credit: Herman J. Engel, Sonya Freidman and Texture Films
brief_description: Part three of a three part compilation history of the documentary film. This part presents films from 1948-1976. Each sequence offers an important example of documentary film style, content and construction. Before eac of the documentaries presented, there is an introduction that place the film historically.
